/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a bustling city street, bathed in the soft glow of a bright sun in the sky. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of looking up at the towering buildings that line the street. These structures, painted in shades of white and gray, rise high into the clear blue sky, their windows reflecting the sunlight.

The street itself is a hive of activity. Cars of various colors are scattered across the road, their drivers navigating their way through the city's arteries. Pedestrians can be seen strolling along the sidewalks, adding a human element to the urban landscape.

In the distance, a large white building with a blue roof stands out against the cityscape. Its size and distinctive color make it a focal point in the image. To the right of this building, a smaller white structure with a red roof adds a splash of color to the scene.

Despite the busyness of the scene, there's a sense of order and rhythm to the city's daily life. Each element, from the towering buildings to the moving cars and pedestrians, contributes to the dynamic yet harmonious cityscape captured in this image.
